revised_title: Calculus of Functions: General Case Investigation
tldr: William Spottiswoode investigates the general case of Mr. W.H.L. Russell's systems of multiplication and division for functions of non-commutative symbols. He extends the formulas and provides the quotient and remainder after both internal and external division for the symbolical function Pn0U(7r) + P9t'l0njl(7) +... o, p.
